author: Rendella, Prospero, fl. 1629
title: Tractatvs de vinea, vindemia, et vino / Prospero Rendella ... authore. In quo quæ ad vineæ tutelam & culturam, vindemiæ opus, vinitoris documenta pertinent; ac plures quæstiones, & leges, animaduertuntur, & dilucidè explicantur. Nec non vini genera plurin
